appropriateGuarantees.description: OpenTelemetry Astronomy Shop enters into agreements with itsprocessors which precisely defi ne the conditions and procedures for processing personaldata. [...] OpenTelemetry Astronomy Shop shall secure such transfers by [...] using a service provider who has adopted binding rules recognized by the Europeansupervisory authorities.

standardDataProtectionClause.description: OpenTelemetry Astronomy Shop shall secure such transfers by: entering into an agreement on cross-border data flows established in compliance with the standard contractual provisions issued by the European Commission, or

adequacyDecision.description: selects service providers located outside the European Union in a country with anadequate level of protection of personal data as recognized by the European Commission,or...

accessAndDataPortability.description: All data subjects enjoy the following rights with regard to data relating to them: [...] a right of access. [...] In connection with the right of access, OpenTelemetry Astronomy Shop may request that you pay reasonable charges based on the administrative costs for any additional copy of the data to that provided.

administrativeFee.description: In connection with the right of access, OpenTelemetry Astronomy Shop may request that you pay reasonablecharges based on the administrative costs for any additional copy of the data to thatprovided.

rightToInformation.description: All data subjects enjoy the following rights with regard to data relating to them: [...] a right to information

rightToRectificationOrDeletion.description: All data subjects enjoy the following rights with regard to data relating to them: [...] - a right of correction; - a right of deletion (unless the data are required for service provision, or necessary to enable OpenTelemetry Astronomy Shop to comply with its legal obligations or to establish or exercise its rights)

rightToDataPortability.description: You also enjoy: [...] a right to portability of the data provided;

rightToWithdrawConsent.description: You may also withdraw your consent at any time, whenever your consent has been requested (withdrawal of consent will not affect the lawfulness of the processing carried out prior to the withdrawal of your consent).

rightToComplain.description: 8.4 Lodging a complaint Where, after having contacted us, that your rights over you data have not been respected, you may send a complaint to the National Commission on Information Technology and Liberties (CNIL), the French Data Protection Authority.

changesOfPurpose.description: It may be subject to change depending on the applicable legal and regulatory framework.
